item.title: Introduce to CoursePrettier
item.description: The project is now hosted on Here, you can try it out! What is CoursePrettier? CoursePrettier is a web-based project that aims to provide a better course schedule experience for students in ShanghaiTech University. With CoursePrettier, students can log in to their school account and enjoy a more refined course table that is visually appealing and easy to read. Light Mode Dark Mode Why we need CoursePrettier? The old EAMS system in ShanghaiTech University is what we need to deal with from day to day.
